rooms.description: A welcoming space that includes a small reception and sitting area. Designed with ample natural light and adherence to Vastu principles by positioning the entrance facing east.
An open space combining living and dining, with ample seating and entertainment zones. Large windows for natural lighting; positioned to allow east-west sunlight.
Spacious bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom. The master suite is located in the northeast quadrant, adhering to Vastu for health and prosperity.
Second bedroom designed with ample storage and natural light. Positioned in the north sector as per Vastu recommendations.
Third bedroom with adequate space for personal belongings. Placed in the northwest sector, following Vastu norms.
Fourth bedroom for guest or extended family members. Located in the southeast sector, ensuring balance and harmony.
Fifth bedroom suitable for the joint family setup, ensuring privacy and comfort. Placed in the southwest quadrant.
Sixth bedroom designed to accommodate family needs, located in the southern sector.
A quiet study or home office space with natural lighting from east-facing windows, following Vastu for knowledge and intellect.
Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances. Designed to face north to avoid heat and maintain cleanliness per Vastu principles.
A separate living space for the staff, with individual sleeping area and attached bathroom. Ensures privacy and functionality.
A small yet functional guest bathroom for visitors located near common areas.

additional_features.description: A modern swimming pool located in the south-east corner of the plot, designed with safety rails and proper drainage systems. The pool is set within a landscaped area to enhance relaxation.
A spacious terrace on the roof providing panoramic views of the surroundings, ideal for gatherings and leisure activities. Equipped with seating areas and integrated lighting.
